title: Google Generative AI Embedding Function Schema
description: Schema for the Google Generative AI embedding function configuration

api_key.description: API key for the Google Generative AI API

model_name.description: The name of the model to use for text embeddings

task_type.description: The task type for the embeddings (e.g., RETRIEVAL_DOCUMENT)

api_key_env_var.description: Environment variable name that contains your API key for the Google Generative AI API
